author: rickhall
msg: Modified example bundles to use the released version of the bundle plugin.

author: fhanik
msg: Add in the ability to turn off reverse DNS lookups for membership on a global scale.
alot of system aren't configured for this, so simple debugging or warn messages that try to print the name, cause timeouts

msg: HADOOP-2605. Remove bogus slash in task-tracker report bindAddress. Contributed by Konstantin Shvachko
